short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unity PC Assistant for Google Chrome by Luke B

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Redcentric - Unity Assistant.


- Fixed bug where extension would not render
- Ongoing calls are now listed on main tab

- Experimental chrome plugin
- Limited support provided, zero SLA
- Bugs reports and feature requests welcomed.
